name: Bijay Kumar Dalabehera
description: MLA of Baramba assembly constituency, representing BJP, driving local governance and development in Badamba.

name: Bhartruhari Mahtab
description: MP of Cuttack parliamentary constituency, influencing regional policies and development projects including Badamba.

name: Badamba Community Health Centre
description: Provides essential medical services to Badamba and nearby villages, supporting community health.

name: WOSCA
description: Strengthens communities through education, science programs, and socio-economic initiatives in Cuttack district.

name: Swachha Odisha Gram Vikas
description: Chola and WEE collaboration in Aranda Kendu Sahi, building 45+ toilets to eliminate open defecation.

name: Education and Skill Development
description: NGO-led programs to enhance education in government schools and provide skill training for women and youth.

name: SADA Grocery Shop
description: Popular grocery store in Beliapal, open 24/7, offering daily essentials to the community.

name: Maniabandha Market
description: A vibrant market 9 km from Badamba, known for Sambalpuri textiles and Dhokra crafts.
